input_dim.description: Input dimension of the neural network (for time-dependent PINNs this is usually the state dimension plus 1).

output_dim.description: Output dimension of the neural network (for PINNs this is usually the state dimension).

num_neurons.description: Number of neurons per hidden layer.

lower_bound.description: Lower bound for all input-dimensions. The array must have a length of input_dim.

upper_bound.description: Upper bound for all input-dimensions. The array must have a length of input_dim

res_net_skip_length.description: In case a residual neural network shall be built, the number of hidden layers to bypass shall be set here.
